name: DoughNuts
description:
DoughNuts is a platformer game where the objective is to help chef Doughnut re-collect the lost pages of the Royal Recipe Collection.

Controls:

Z/P Press to use recipe, hold down to run. X/O Press to jump, hold down to jump higher. Arrow keys/WASD Move the chef.

The game was made for the A Game By Its Cover 2016 game jam, based on the Famicase cover art Doki Doki Doughnut Panic by Jay D. Smith:


DoughNuts currently only consists of three levels, a single special power to obtain (i.e. a single recipe), an a basic 'boss'-fight; however, I plan to add much more post jam.
